description:
Zatch’s Seventh Spell Zagurzem appears in his spell book! Kiyo realizes it is a powerful spell that charges up electricity and attracts Zatch’s successive spells to the spot initially hit. He firmly believes that Demolt can be defeated by hammering him wi
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Evil Beast Demoruto, Final Deciding Battle!
凶獣デモルト最終決戦!!
